turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Stephanie can you order a starbucks to go for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure Beth, which starbucks should I go to? do you have a preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please to go to the starbucks at 1957 E St NW, Washington, DC 20052.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, no problem. Are you ordering a drink ahead of time or should I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll order my drink online to save you the hassle of trying to order in store

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you Beth, that is really helpful.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay so I ordered a Venti extra hot no water dirty chai latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Beth, can you order a drink for me online as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure Steph, what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can you order me a grande iced salted caramel mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, taken are of. To clarify, I ordered a Venti extra hot no water chai latte and you ordere a grande iced salted caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes that sounds correct. Thank you for covering my drink or me.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are very welcome Steph. Just to make sure you're picking up starbucks from 1957 E St NW, Washington, DC 20052.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am on my way right now. Can you send me a confirmation screenshot to show the barista?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just sent you the screenshot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Stopping my starbucks right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Were you able to pick up the drinks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they are picked up and are correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll see you shortly at the office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Be there in 5 minutes.
